title: Image Caption Generation System
shortDescription: • Next.js + FastAPI + PyTorch Transformer (MS COCO) generating captions for uploads. • TorchScript inference served via FastAPI; responsive Next.js UI for upload, captions, and history. • Auth with JWT guest sessions + account merge; persisted via SQLModel (SQLite default, Postgres optional). • Dockerized stack behind Nginx; Supervisor manages services, Postgres optional.
